GK19bahcar3u:17: śaratsamayārambhe rājñaḥ samīpādvāṇo bandhūndraṣṭuṃ punarāpi taṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagāt /
GK19bahcar3u:25_0: prīyamāṇena ca manasā sarvāṃstānparyapṛcchart--”kāccadetāvato divasānsu kano yūyam? apratyūhā vā samyakkaraṇaparitoṣitadvijacakrā
GK19bahcar3u:25_1: krātavī kriyā kriyate? yayāvadavikalamantrabhāñji bhuñjate vā havīṃṣi hutabhujaḥ?
GK19bahcar3u:26: yathākālamadhoyate vā baṭavaḥ? pratidinamavicchinno vā vedābhyāsaḥ?
GK19bahcar3u:27: kaccitsa eva cirantano yajñavidyākarnaṇyabhiyogaḥ? tānyeva vyākaraṇe parasparaspardhānubandhābandhyadivasadarśitādarāṇi
GK19bahcar3u:28: saiva vā purātīnī parityaktānyakartavyā pramāṇagoṣṭhī, sa eva vā
GK19bahcar3u:29: mandīkṛtetaraśāstraraso mīmāṃsāyāmatirasaḥ? kaccitta evābhinavasubhāṣitasudhāvarṣiṇaḥ kāvyālāpāḥ?' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:30_0: atha te tamūcu-”tāta! saṃtoṣajuṣāṃ satatasaṃnihitavidyāvinodānāṃ vaitānavahnimātrasahāyānāṃ kiyanmātraṃ na kṛtyaṃ sukhitayā
GK19bahcar3u:31: sarvathā sukhina eva vayam, viśeṣeṇa tu tvayi vimuktakausīdye parameśvarapārśvavartini vetrāsanamadhitiṣṭhati
GK19bahcar3u:32_0: sarve ca yathāśakti yathāvibhavaṃ yathākāla ca saṃpādyante viprajanocitāḥ kriyākalāpāḥ' ityevamādibhirālāpaiḥ skandāvāravārtābhiśca
GK19bahcar3u:34: bhuktavantaṃ ca ta sarve jñātayaḥ paryavārayan /
GK19bahcar3u:35: atrāntare dukūlapaṭṭaprabhave śikhaṇḍyapāṅgapāṇḍunī pauṇḍre vāsasī vasānaḥ snānāvasānasamaye vanditayā torthamṛdā gorocanayā ca racitatilakaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:41_0: sthitvā ca mudūrtamiva tatkālāpanītasūtraveṣṭanamapi nakhakiraṇairmṛdumṛṇālasūtrauravāveṣṭitaṃ pustakaṃ puronihitaśaraśalākāyantrake
GK19bahcar3u:41_1: nidhāya, pṛṣṭhataḥ sanīḍasaṃniviṣṭābhyāṃ madhukarapārāvatābhyāṃ vaṃśikābhyāṃ datte sthānake prābhātikaprapāṭhakacchedacihnīkṛtamantaraṃ
GK19bahcar3u:41_2: patramutkṣipya, gṛhītvā ca katipayapatralaghvīṃ kapāṭikām kṣālayanniva maṣīmalinānyakṣarāṇi
GK19bahcar3u:43: mukhasaṃnihitasarasvatīnūpuraravairiva gamakairmadhurairākṣipanmanāṃsi śrotṝṇāṃ gītyā pavamānaproktaṃ purāṇaṃ papāṭha /
GK19bahcar3u:44: tasmiṃśca tathā śrutisubhagagītigarbhaṃ paṭhati sudṛṣṭau nātidūravartī vandī sūcībāṇastāramadhureṇa
GK19bahcar3u:46: tadapi munigītamatipṛthu tadapi jagadvyāpi pāvanaṃ tadapi/
GK19bahcar3u:50: tacchrutvā bāṇasya catvāraḥ pitāmahamukhapajhā iva vedābhyāsapāvatritamūrtayaḥ, upāyā iva sāmaprayogalalitamukhāḥ, gaṇapatiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:51: adhipatiḥ, tārāpatiḥ, śyāmala iti pitṛvyaputrā bhrātaraḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:57: vayasi vacasi yaśasi tapasi sadasi mahasi vapuṣi yajuṣi ca prathamāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:60_0: atha teṣāṃ kanīyānkamaladaladīrghalocanaḥ śyāmalo nāma bāṇasya preyānprāṇānāmapi vaśayitā dattasaṃjñastaiḥ sapraṇayaṃ daśanajyotsnāsnapitakakubhā
GK19bahcar3u:60_1: mukhendunā babhāṣe--”tāta bāṇa! dvijānāṃ rājā gurudāragrahaṇamakārṣīt purūravā brāhnaṇadhanatṛṣṇayā dayitenāyuṣā vyayujyata /
GK19bahcar3u:79: itthaṃ nāsti rājatvamapakalaṅgamṛte devadevādamataḥ sarvadvīpabhūjo harṣāt
GK19bahcar3u:81: tathā hi-atra balajitā niścalīkṛtāścalantaḥ kṛtapakṣāḥ kṣitibhṛtaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:88: atra parameśvareṇa tuṣāraśailabhuvo durgāyā gṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:89: atra lokanāthena diśāṃ mukheṣu parikalpitā lokapālāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:90: sakalabhuvanakośaścāgrajanmanāṃ vibhaktaḥ, ityevamādayaḥ prathamakṛtayugasyeva dṛśyante mahāsamārambhāḥ
GK19bahcar3u:94: ayaskāntamaṇaya iva lohāni nīrasaniṣṭhurāṇi kṣullakānāmapyākarṣanti manāṃsi mahatāṃ guṇāḥ, kimuta svabhāvasarasamṛdūnītareṣām /
GK19bahcar3u:95: kasya na dvitīyamahābhārate bhavedasya carite kutūhalam? ācaṣṭā bhabān /
GK19bahcar3u:101: paraguṇānurāgiṇī priyajanakathāśravaṇarasarabhasamohitā ca manye mahatāmapi matirapaharati pravivekam /
GK19bahcar3u:102_0: paśyatvāryaḥ kva paramāṇuparimāṇaṃ baṭuhṛdayam, kva samastabrahnastambhavyāpi devasya caritam? kva pāramitavarṇarvṛttayaḥ
GK19bahcar3u:103_0: vācaspaterapyagocaraḥ, sarasvatyā apyatibhāraḥ, kimutāsmadvidhasya? kaḥ khalu puruṣāyuṣaśatenāpi śaknuyādavikalamasya caritaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:103_1: varṇayitum? ekadeśe tu yadi kutūhalaṃ vaḥ, sajjā vayam /
GK19bahcar3u:108: divasaḥ paścāllambanamānakapilakiraṇajaṭābhārabhāsvaro bhagavānbhārgavarāma iva samantapañcakaru dheramahāhrade nimajjati sadhyārāgapaṭale pūṣā /
GK19bahcar3u:114: ravirathaturagamārgānusāreṇa yamamahiṣa iva dhāvati nabhasi tamasi,
GK19bahcar3u:115: krameṇa ca gṛhatāpasakuṭorakapaṭalāvalambiṣu raktātapacchedaiḥ saha sahṛteṣu valkaleṣu, kalikalmaṣamuṣi muṣṇati gaganamagnihotradhāmadhūme,
GK19bahcar3u:116: saniyame yajamānajane manauvratini, vihāravelāvilole paryaṭati patnījane,
GK19bahcar3u:120: tāladhvanidhāvamānānantāntevāsini alasavṛddhaśrotriyānumatena galadgranthadaṇḍakodgāriṇi sadyāṃ samavadhārayati vaṭharaviṭabaṭusamāje,
GK19bahcar3u:121: samunjjati ca jyotiṣi tārakākhye khe, prāpte pradoṣārambhe bhavanamāgatyopaviṣṭaḥ snigdhairbandhubhiśca sārdha tayaiva goṣṭhayā tasthau /
GK19bahcar3u:123: itareṣāṃ tu sarvaṣāṃ nimīlitadṛśāmapyanupajātanidrāṇāṃ kamalavanānāmiva sūryodayaṃ pratipālayatāṃ kutūhalena kathamapi sā kṣapā kṣayamagacchat /
GK19bahcar3u:124: atha yāminyāsturye yāma pratibuddhaḥ sa eva bandī ślokadvayamagāyat--
GK19bahcar3u:127: ghāsagrāsābhilāṣādanavaratacalatprothatuṇḍasturaṅgo mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanādutthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa' // 3.5 //
GK19bahcar3u:128: kurvannābhugnapṛṣṭho mukhanikaṭakaṭi kandharāmātiraścīṃ lolenāhanyamānaṃ tuhitakaṇamucā cañcatā kesareṇa /
GK19bahcar3u:129: nidrākaṇḍūkaṣāyaṃ kaṣati nibiḍitaśrotraśuktisturaṅgas tvaṅgatpakṣmāpralagnagantanuvusakaṇaṃ koṇamakṣṇaḥ khureṇa // 3.6 //
GK19bahcar3u:130: bāṇastu tacchratbā samutsṛjya nidrāmutthāya pkṣālya vadanamupāsya ca bhagavatīṃ saṃdhyāmudite ca bhagavati savitari gṛhītatāmbūlastatraivātiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar3u:131: atrāntare sarve 'sya jñātayaḥ samājagmuḥ, parivāye cāsāṃcakrire /
GK19bahcar3u:132: asāvapi pūrvoddhātena viditābhiprāyasteṣāṃ puro harṣacaritaṃ kathayitumārebhe-- śrūyatām--asti puṇyakṛtāmadhivāso vāsavāvāsa iva
GK19bahcar3u:140: vividhamakhahomadhūmāndhaśatamanyumuktairlocanaurava sahasrasaṃkhyaiḥ kṛṣṇaśāraiḥ śārīkṛtoddeśaḥ, dhavaladhūmimucā ketakīvanānāṃ rajobhiḥ
GK19bahcar3u:154: toyāśayairmaṇḍitaḥ, mathitapayaḥpravāhaprakṣālitakṣitibhiḥ kṣīrodamathanārambhairiva mahāghoṣaiḥ pūritāśaḥ śrīkaṇṭho nāma janapadaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:163: vṛṣavivāhaprahatapuṇyapaṭahapaṭurava trāsitā iva nopāsarpannapamṛtyavaḥ saṃtatabrahnaghoṣabadhirīkṛtā ivāpajagmurītayaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:169_1: vipakṣa ivottarakurūpaṇām, riśvaramārgaṇasaṃtāpānabhijñasakalajano vijigīṣuriva tripurasya, sudhārasasiktadhavalagṛhapaṅktipāṇḍuraḥ
GK19bahcar3u:169_2: pratinighiriva candralokasya, madhumadamattakāśinībhūṣaṇaravabharitabhuvano nāmābhihāra iva kubera nagarasya, sthāṇvīśvarākhyo
GK19bahcar3u:171: lāsakaiḥ, yamanagaramiti śatrubhiḥ, cintāmaṇibhūmirityarthibhiḥ vīrakṣetramiti śastropajīvibhiḥ, gurukulamiti vidyārthibhiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:173: lābhabhūmiriti vandehakaiḥ, dyūtasthānamiti bandhibhiḥ, sādhusamāgama iti sadbhiḥ, vajrapañjaramiti śaraṇāgataiḥ, viṭagoṣṭhīti vidagdhaiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:174: sukṛtapariṇāma iti pathikaiḥ, asuravivaramiti vātikaiḥ śākyāśrama iti
GK19bahcar3u:175: śamibhiḥ, apsaraḥpuramiti kāmibhiḥ, mahotsavasamāja iti cāraṇaiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:177: yatra ca mātaṅgāminyaḥ śīlavatyaśca, gauryo vibhavaratāśca, śmāmāḥ
GK19bahcar3u:182: yatra ca pramadānāṃ cakṣureva sahajamuṇḍamālāmaṇḍanaṃ bhāraḥ
GK19bahcar3u:183: kuvalayadaladāmāni, alakapratibimbānyeva kapīlatalagatānyakliṣṭāḥ śravaṇāvataṃsāḥ panaruktāni tamālakisalayāni, priyakathā eva subhagāḥ
GK19bahcar3u:184: karṇālakārā āḍambaraḥ kumḍalādiḥ, kapolā eva satatamālokakārakā vibhavo niśāsu maṇipradopāḥ surabhiniḥsvāsākṛṣṭaṃ madhukarakulameva ramaṇīyaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:185: mukhāvaraṇaṃ kulastrījanācāro jālikā, vāṇyeva madhuratarā vīṇā
GK19bahcar3u:186: bāhyavijñānaṃ tantrītāḍanam, hāsā evātiśayasurabhayaḥ paṭavāsā nirarthakāḥ
GK19bahcar3u:187: karpūrapāṃsavaḥ, adharakāntivisara evojjvalataro 'ṅgarāgo nirguṇo lāvaṇyakalaṅkaḥ kuṅkumapaṅkaḥ, bāhava eva komalatamāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:188_0: parihāsaprahāravetralatā niṣprayojanāni mṛṇālāni, yauvanoṣmasvedabindava eva vidagdhāḥ kucākakṛtayo hārāstu bhārāḥ, śroṇya
GK19bahcar3u:191: nūpuraravāhṛtā bhavanakalahaṃsā eva samucitāḥ saṃcaraṇasahāyā aiśvaryaprapañcāḥ parijanāḥ
GK19bahcar3u:192_0: tatra ca sākṣātsahasrākṣa iva sarvavarṇadharaṃ dhanurdadhānaḥ, meramaya iva kalyāṇaprakṛtitve, mandaramaya iva lakṣmīsamākarṣaṇe,
GK19bahcar3u:192_1: jalanidhimaya iva maryādāyām, ākāśamaya iva śabdaprādurbhāve, śaśimaya iva kalāsaṃgrahe,
GK19bahcar3u:193: vedamaya ivākṛtrimālāpatve, dharaṇimaya iva lokadhṛtikaraṇe, pavanamaya iva sarvapārthivarajovikāraharaṇe, gururvacasi, pṛthururasi, viśālo
GK19bahcar3u:194: manasi, janakastapasi, suyātrastejasi, sumantro rahasi, budhaḥ sadasi,
GK19bahcar3u:195: arjuno yaśasi, bhīṣmo dhanuṣi, niṣadho vapuṣi, śatrughnaḥ samare, śūraḥ śūrasenākramaṇedaśaḥ prajākarmaṇi, sarvādirājatejaḥpuñjanirmita iva rājā
GK19bahcar3u:197: pṛṣunā gauriveyaṃ kṛteti yaḥ spardhamāna iva mahīṃ mahiṣīṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar3u:198: nisargasvairiṇī svarucyanurodhinī ca bhavati hi mahatāṃ matiḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:200: bhagavati, bhaktisurabhe, bhuvanabhṛti, bhūtabhāvane, bhavacchidi, bhave bhūyasī bhaktirabhūt
GK19bahcar3u:206: vavurasya homālavālānalavilīyamānabahalaguggulu gandhagarbhāḥ snapanakṣīraśīkarakṣodakṣāriṇo vilvapallavadāmadalodvāhinaḥ puṇya viṣayeṣu vāyavaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:207: śivasaparyāsamucitairupāyanaiḥ prābhṛtaiśca paurāḥ pādopajīvinaḥ sacivāḥ svabhujabalanirjitāśca karadīkṛtā mahāsāmantāstaṃ siṣevire /
GK19bahcar3u:210_0: tathā ca paramamāheśvaraḥ sa bhūpālo lokataḥ śuśrāva bhuvi bhagavantamaparamiva sākṣāddakṣamakhamathanaṃ dākṣiṇātya bahuvidhavidyāprabhāvaprakhyātairguṇaiḥ
GK19bahcar3u:212: yataḥ sa rājā śravaṇasamakālameva tasminbheravācārye bhagavati dvitīya iva kapardini dūragate 'pi garīyasīṃ babandha bhaktim /
GK19bahcar3u:217: rājā tu tacchratvā sādaram--”kvāsau? ānayātraiva, praveśayainam' iti cābravīt /
GK19bahcar3u:219: na cirācca prāṃvaśantaṃ prāṃśum, ājānubhujam, bhaikṣakṣāmamapi sthūlāsthibhiravayavaiḥ pīvaramivopalakṣyamāṇam,
GK19bahcar3u:223_0: turagānūkaślathādharalekham, lambacibukāyatataralapanam, aṃsāvalambinā kāṣāyeṇa yogapaṭṭakena viracitavaikakṣakam, hṛdayamadhyanibaddhagranthinā
GK19bahcar3u:223_1: ca rāgeṇeva khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtena dhāturasāruṇena karpaṭena kṛtottarāsaṅgam,
GK19bahcar3u:227: sādaranarapativacanamuditamatistu parivrāṭ tamupanagaraṃ sarasvatītaṭavanāvalambini śūnyāyatane sthitamācacakṣe /
GK19bahcar3u:228_0: bhūyaścābabhāṣe--”arcayati hi mahābhāgaṃ bhagavānāśīrvatacasā' ityuktvā copaninye yogabhārakādākṛṣya bhairavācāryaprahitāni
GK19bahcar3u:228_1: ratnavanti bahalālokaliptāntaḥ purāṇi pañca rājatāni puṇḍarīkāṇi narapatistu priyajanapraṇayabhaṅgakātaro dākṣiṇyamanurudhyamāno
GK19bahcar3u:228_2: grahaṇalāghavaṃ ca laṅghayitumasamartho dolāyamānena manasā sthitvā ciraṃ kathakathamapyatisaujanyanighnastāni jagrāha /
GK19bahcar3u:232: śvo draṣṭāsmi bhagavantam' ityuktvā ca maskariṇaṃ vyasarjayat /
GK19bahcar3u:234_0: aparedyuśca prātarevotthāya vājinamadhiruhya samucchritaśvetātapatraḥ samuddhūyamānadhavalacāmarayugalaḥ katipayaireva rājaputraiḥ
GK19bahcar3u:234_1: parivṛto bhairavācāryaṃ savitāramiva śaśī draṣṭuṃ pratasthe /
GK19bahcar3u:240: atha mahataḥ kārpaṭhikavṛndasya madhye prātareva snātam, taddāṣṭapuṣpikam,
GK19bahcar3u:243: pātālāndhakārāvāsamivābhyasyantam, unmiṣitā vidyutkapilenātmatejasā mahāmāṃsavikrayakrītena manaḥ śilāpaṅkeneva śiṣyalokaṃ limpantam,
GK19bahcar3u:247_1: sahajalalāṭabalibhaṅgasakocitakūrcabhāgāṃ bamrubhāsaṃ bhrūsaṃgatyā nirantarāmāyāminīmekāmiva bhrūlekhāṃ bibhrāṇam,
GK19bahcar3u:252: kiñciddanturatayāsadāhṛdayasaṃnihitaharaṇaulicandrātapeneva nirgacchatā dantālokena dhavala yantaṃ diśaṃ jālam,
GK19bahcar3u:255: baddhavivi ghauṣadhimantrasūtrapaṅktinā sarohavalayene prakaṣṭh śaṅkhaṇḍaṃ pūṣṇao dantatamiva bhagavatā bhavena bhagne bhaktyā bhṛṣaṇīkṛtaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:256_0: kalayantam, akhilarasakūpodañcanaghaṭīyantramālāmiva rudrākṣamālāṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā bhramayantam, urasi dolāyamānenāpiṅgalāgreṇa
GK19bahcar3u:257: atinibiḍanīlalomamaṇḍalavicitaṃ ca dhyānalabdhena jyotiṣā dagdhamiva hṛdayadeśaṃ dadhānarm,
GK19bahcar3u:267: jalanidhimivānekanadanadīsahasraprakṣālitaśarīram, jāṅnavīpravāhamiva bahu puṇyatīrthasthānaśūcim, dhāma dharmasya, tīrthaṃ tathyasya, kośaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:268: kuśalasya, pattanaṃ pūtatāyāḥ śālā śolasya, kṣetraṃ kṣamāyāḥ śāleyaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:269: śalīnatāyāḥ, pattanaṃ pūtatāyāḥ, śālā śolasya, kṣetraṃ kṣamāyāḥ śāleyaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:270: śālīnatāyāḥ, sthānaṃ sthiteḥ, ādhāraṃ dhṛteḥ ākaraṃ karuṇāyāḥ, niketana
GK19bahcar3u:271: kautukasya, ārāmaṃ rāmaṇeyakamya, pāsādaṃ prasādasya, āgāraṃ gauravasya,
GK19bahcar3u:272: samāja saujanyasya, saṃbhavaṃ sadbhāvasya, kālaṃ kaleḥ, bhagavantaṃ sakṣādiva virūpākṣaṃ bhairavācāryaṃ dadarśa /
GK19bahcar3u:273: bhairavācāryastu dūrādeva rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā śaśinamiva jalanidhiścacāla /
GK19bahcar3u:276_0: narapatirapi prītivistāryamāṇadhavalimnā cakṣuṣā pratyarpayanniva bahutarāṇi puṇḍarīkavanāni lalāṭapaṭṭaparyastena codaṃsunā
GK19bahcar3u:278: upadarśitapraśrayastu rājā mattahasakalagadgadasvarasubhagāṃ madhurasamayīṃ mahānadīmiva pravartayanvācaṃ vyājahāra--”bhagavan! nārhasi māmanyanṛpaskhalitaiḥ khalīkartum /
GK19bahcar3u:279: aśeṣarājakopekṣitāyā hatalakṣmyāḥ khalvayaṃ śīlāparādho draviṇadaurātmyaṃ vā yadevamācarati mayi guruḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:284: āsatāṃ ca bhavanta evātra' iti vyāhṛtyā parijanopanīte vāsasi niṣasāda /
GK19bahcar3u:286: āsīne ca sarājake parijane śiṣyajane ca samucitamardhyādikaṃ cakre /
GK19bahcar3u:287: krameṇa ca nṛpamādhuryahṛtāntaḥkaraṇaḥ śaśikaranikaravimalā daśanadīdhitīḥ sphurantīḥ śivabhaktīriva sākṣād draśayannuvāca-”tāta! atinamrataiva te kathayati guṇānāṃ gauravam /
GK19bahcar3u:296: pratanuguṇagrāhyāṇi kusumānīva hi bhavanti satāṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar3u:297: api ca, vidbatsaṃmatāḥ śrūyamāṇā api sādhavaḥ śabdā iva sudhore 'pi hi manasi yaśāṃsi kuvaṃnti
GK19bahcar3u:298: vivaraṃ viśataḥ kutūhalasya phenadhavarlaḥ srotobhirivāpahriyamāṇo guṇagaṇairānoto 'smi kalyāṇinā' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:299: rājā tu taṃ pratyavādīt--”bhagavan! anurakteṣvapi śarīrādiṣa sādhūnāṃ
GK19bahcar3u:302: anenaivāgamanena spṛhaṇīyaṃ padamāropito 'smi guruṇā' iti vividhābhiśca kathābhiściraṃ sthitvā gṛhamagāt /
GK19bahcar3u:304: tasmai ca rājā sāntaḥpuraṃ saparijanaṃ sakoṣamātmānaṃ niveditavān /
GK19bahcar3u:305: sa ca vihasyāvāca--”tāta! kva vibhavāḥ, kva ca vayaṃ vanavardhitāḥ?
GK19bahcar3u:308: bhavādṛśā eva bhājanaṃ bhūteḥ' iti sthitvā ca kañcitkālaṃ jagāma /
GK19bahcar3u:309: parivrāṭ tenaiva krameṇa pañca pañca rājatāni puṇḍarīkāṇyupāyanīcakāra /
GK19bahcar3u:311: upaviśya ca pūrvavatsthitvā muhūrtamabravīt--”mahābhāga! bhavantamāha bhagavānyathāsmacchiṣyaḥ pātālasvāmināmā brāhnaṇaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:313: so 'yaṃ bhavadbhujayogyo gṛhyatām' ityabhidhāyāpahṛtakarpaṭāvacchādanāt parivārādācakarṣa śaradgaganatalamiva piṇḍatāṃ nītam, kālindīpravāhamiva
GK19bahcar3u:314: stambhitajalam, nandakajigīṣayā kṛṣṇakopitaṃ kāliyamiva kṛpāmatāṃ gatam,
GK19bahcar3u:317_0: kṛtadṛḍhamuṣṭigraham, sakalabhuvanajīvitāpaharaṇakṣameṇa kālakūṭeneva nirmitam, kṛtāntakopānalataptenevāyasā ghaṭitam, atitīkṣṇatayā
GK19bahcar3u:321: kālasya, oṅkāramiva krauyasya alakāramahaṅkārasya, kulamitraṃ kopasya,
GK19bahcar3u:322: dehaṃ darpasya, susahāyaṃ sāhasasya, apatyaṃ mṛtyoḥ, āgamanamārgaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:324: avanipatistu taṃ gṛhītvā kareṇāyudhaprītyā pratimānibhenālihganniva suciraṃ dadarśa /
GK19bahcar3u:326: me mano yuṣmadviṣaye na śaknoti vacanavyatikramavyabhicāramācaritum' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:327: paribrāṭ tu gṛhīte tasmin parituṣṭaḥ “svasti bhavate /
GK19bahcar3u:329: nṛpaśca prakṛtyā vīrarasānurāgī tena kṛpāṇenāmanyata karatalavartinī medinīm /
GK19bahcar3u:330: atha bajatsu divaseṣvakadā bhairavācāryo rājānamupaṅvare sopagrahamavādīt--”tāta! svārthālasāḥ paropakāradakṣāśca prakṛtayo
GK19bahcar3u:336: bhagavato mahākālahṛdayanāmno mahāmantrasya kṛṣṇasragambarānulepanenākalpena kalpakathitena mahāśmaśāne japakoṭyā kṛtapūrvasevo 'smi /
GK19bahcar3u:341: ekaḥ sa evāsmākaṃ ṭāṭibhanāmā bālamitraṃ maskarī yo bhavantamupatiṣṭhate /
GK19bahcar3u:344: yadi sādhu manyase tato nīyatāmayaṃ diṅnāgahastadīrgho gṛhītāṭṭahāso niśāmekāmekadiṅmukhārgalatāṃ bāhuḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:345: ' iti kṛtavacasi ca tasminnandhakārapraviṣṭa iva dṛṣṭaprakāśaḥ
GK19bahcar3u:347: samabhāṣata--”bhagavan! paramanugṛhīto 'smyanena śiṣyajanasāmānyena nideśena kṛtaparigrahamivātmānamavaimi' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:350: belāyāmamuṣmin mahāśmaśānasamīpabhāji śūnyāyatane śastradvitīyenāyuṣmatā draṣṭavyā vayam' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:351: athātikrānteṣvahaḥsu prāptāyāṃ ca tasyāmeva kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śaivena vidhinā dīkṣitaḥ kṣitipo niyamānabhūta /
GK19bahcar3u:353_0: tataḥ pariṇate divase kenāpi karmasādhanāya kṛtarudhirabalividhānāsviva lohitāyamānāsu dikṣu rudhirabalilampaṭāsu ca belālajihvāsviva
GK19bahcar3u:353_1: lambamānāsu ca ravidīdhitiṣu, narendrānurāgeṇa gṛhītāparadiśi svayamiva dikpālatāṃ cikīrṣati savitari, yātudhānīṣviva vardhamānāsu
GK19bahcar3u:354_0: pātālatalavāsiṣu vighnāya dānaveṣvivottiṣṭhatsu tamomaṇḍaleṣu, nabhasi puñjībhavati raudraṃ karma didṛkṣamāṇā iva nakṣatragaṇe
GK19bahcar3u:354_1: vigāḍhāyāṃ śarvaryām, suptajane niḥśabdastimite niśīthe, rājā sāntaḥpuraṃ parijanaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:355_0: vañcayitvā vāmakarasphuratsarurdakṣiṇakareṇotkhāta khaḍgamaṭṭahāsamādāya visarpatā ca khaḍgaprabhāpaṭalena nīlāṃśukapaṭeneva
GK19bahcar3u:356: atha pratyupajagmuste trayo 'pi drauṇikṛpakṛtavarmāṇa iva sauptike
GK19bahcar3u:357_0: saṃnaddhāḥ snātāḥ sragviṇo gṛhītavikaṭaveṣāḥ, kusumaśekharasaṃcāribhiḥ kriyamāṇamantraśikhābandhā iva guñjadbhiḥ ṣaṭacaraṇeruṣṇīṣapaṭṭakāṃllalāṭamadhyaghaṭitavikaṭasvastikāgranthīnmahāmudrābandhāniva
GK19bahcar3u:357_2: śārvaramandhakāram, itarakarṇāvalambināṃ ratnakuṇḍalānāmacchayā rucā gorocanayeva mantraparijaptayā samālabdhāṅgāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:364: āccakṣire ca svaṃ sva nāma trayo 'pi te /
GK19bahcar3u:365_1: samupakalpitasarvopakaraṇāṃ niḥśabdāṃ ca gambhīrāṃ ca bhīṣaṇāṃ ca sādhanabhūmim /
GK19bahcar3u:366: tasyāṃ ca kumudadhūlidhavalena bhasmanā likhitasya mahato maṇḍalasya madhye sthitaṃ dīptataratejaḥprasaram,
GK19bahcar3u:368: raktacandanānulepino raktasragambarābharaṇasyottānaśayasya śavasyorasyupaviśya jātajātavedasi mukhakuhare prārabdhāgnikāryam,
GK19bahcar3u:378: atrāntare pātālasvāmī śātakratavīmāśāmahgīcakāra, karṇatālaḥ koberīmparivrāṭ prācetasīm /
GK19bahcar3u:380_0: evaṃ cāvasthiteṣu dikpāleṣu dikpālabhujapañjarapraviṣṭe visrabdhaṃ karma sādhayati bhairavaṃ bhairavācārye 'ticiraṃ ca kṛtakolāhaleṣu
GK19bahcar3u:380_1: niṣphalaprayatnaṣu pratyūhakāriṣu śānteṣu kauṇapeṣu galatyardharātrasamaye maṇḍalasya nātidavīyasyuttareṇākasmādeva pralayamahāvarāhadaṃṣṭrāvivaramiva
GK19bahcar3u:382: mahāvarāhapīvaraskandhapīṭho narakāsura iva bhuvo garbhādudbhūto balidānava iva bhitvotthitaḥ pātālam, indranīlaprāsāda
GK19bahcar3u:385_0: gadgadatayā svarasya svabhāvapāṭalatayā ca cakṣuṣaḥ kṣība iva yauvanamadena valgadgaladāmakaḥ, karasaṃpuṭamṛditayā mṛdā diṅnāgakumbhābhāvaṃsakūṭaupunaḥpunaḥ
GK19bahcar3u:386_0: dhavalavyāyāmaphālīpaṭāntena dharaṇitalagatena dhāryamāṇa iva pṛṣṭhataḥ śepeṇa, sthirasthūlorudaṇḍaḥ, bhūmibhaṅgabhayeneva
GK19bahcar3u:386_1: mantharāṇi sthāpayanpadāni nirbharagarvaguru kathamapi śailamiva gātramudvahan darpeṇa muhurmuhururasi dviguṇite doṣṇi vāme
GK19bahcar3u:386_2: tiryagutkṣipte ca dakṣiṇe jaṅghākāṇḍe kuṇḍalite ca caṇḍāsphoṭanaṭāṅkāraiḥ karṇavighnanirghātāniva pātayannekendriyavikalamiva
GK19bahcar3u:386_3: jīvalokaṃ kurvan kuvalayaśyāmalaḥ puruṣa ujjagāma jagāda ca vihasya narasiṃhanādanirghoṣaghorayā bhāratyā--”bho
GK19bahcar3u:388: janāyāvidhāya baliṃ bāliśa iva siddhimabhilaṣasi? kā te durbuddhiriyam?
GK19bahcar3u:389: etāvatā kālena kṣetrādhipatirasya mannāmnaiva labdhavyapadeśasya deśasya nāgataste śrotropakaṇṭhaṃ śrīkaṇṭhanāmā nāgo 'ham? anicchati mayi kā
GK19bahcar3u:392: sahasvedānīṃ sahāmunā durnarendreṇa durnayasya phalam' ityabhidhāya ca niṣṭhuraiḥ prakoṣṭhaprahāraistrīnapi
GK19bahcar3u:395: sāvajñamavādīt--”are kākodara kāka! mayi sthite rājahaṃse na jihreṣi baliṃ
GK19bahcar3u:396: yācitum? amībhiḥ kiṃ vā paruṣabhāṣitaiḥ? bhuje vīryaṃ nivasati, na vāci /
GK19bahcar3u:400: nāgastvanādṛtataram--”ehi, kiṃ śastreṇa? bhujābhyāmevabhanajajmi bhavato darpam' ityabhidhāyāsphoṭayāmāsa
GK19bahcar3u:401: narapatirapi nirāyudhamāyudhena yudhi lajjamāno jetumutsṛjya sacarmaphalakamaṭṭahāsamasimardhoruksayopari babandha bāhuyuddhāya kakṣyām
GK19bahcar3u:402: yuyudhāte ca nirdayāsphoṭanasphuṭitabhujarudhiraśīkarasicyamānau śilāstambhairiva patadbhirbāhudaṇḍaiḥ śabdamayamiva kurvāṇau bhuvanaṃ tau
GK19bahcar3u:403: na cirācca pātayāmāya bhūtale bhujaṅgamaṃ bhūpatiḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:408: yato viśrabdhamevācarasi cāpalāni' ityuktvotsasarja ca tam /
GK19bahcar3u:413: atha karatalasthitasyāṭṭahāsasya madhye taḍitamiva nīlajaladharodare sphurantīṃ prabhayā pibantīmiva triyāmām, tāmarasahastām,
GK19bahcar3u:415_0: velābālavidrumalatāvanānīvākarṣantīm, karapaṅkajasaṃkocāśaṅkayā śaśāṅkamaṇḍalamiva khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtaṃ nirmalacaraṇanakhanivahanibhena
GK19bahcar3u:422_0: dantapatreṇa vibhrājamānām, kaustubhagabhastistabakeneva ca śravaṇalagnenāśokakisalayenālaṅkṛtām, mahatā mattamātaṅgamadamayena
GK19bahcar3u:426: asaṃbhrāntaśca papraccha--”bhadre! kāsi, kimarthaṃ vā darśanapathamāgatāsi?' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:427: sā tu strījanaviruddhenāvaṣṭembhenābhivantīvābhāṣata tam--”vīra! viddhi māṃ nārāyaṇoraḥsthalīlīlāvihārahariṇīm,
GK19bahcar3u:436: vīrāṇāṃ tvapunaruktāḥ paropakārāḥ yato rājā tāṃ praṇamya svārthavimukho bhairavācāryasya siddhiṃ yayāce /
GK19bahcar3u:437: lakṣmīstu devī prītatarahṛdayā vistīryamāṇena cakṣuṣā kṣīrodenevopari paryastenābhiṣiñcantī bhūpālam “evamastu' ityabravīt /
GK19bahcar3u:438_0: avādīcca punaḥ--”anena sattvotkarṣeṇa bhagavacchivabhaṭṭārakabhaktyā cāsādhāraṇayā bhavānbhuvi sūryācandramasostṛtīya ivāvicchinnasya
GK19bahcar3u:439_0: yasminnutpatsyate sarvadvīpānāṃ bhoktā hariścandra iva harṣanāmā cakravartī tribhuvanavijigīṣurdvitīyo māndhāteva yasyāyaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:439_1: karaḥ svayameva kamalamapahāya grīhaṣyati cāmaram' iti vacaso 'nte tirobabhūva bhūmipālastu tadākarṇya hṛdayenātimātramaprīyata /
GK19bahcar3u:440: bhairavācāryo 'pi tasyā devyāstena vacasā karmaṇā ca samyagupapāditena
GK19bahcar3u:441: sadya eva kuntalo kirīṭī kuṇḍalī hārī keyūrī mekhalī mudgarī khaḍhgī ca bhūtvāvāpa vidyādharatvam
GK19bahcar3u:444: svapne 'pyasaṃbāvitāṃ dātumimāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ kṣamaḥ ko 'nyo bhavantamapahāya /
GK19bahcar3u:446: tvadoyairguṇairupakaraṇīkṛtasya tvatta eva ca labdhātmalābhasya nirlajjate yamasya mūḍhahṛdayasya
GK19bahcar3u:450: sādhayatu mānyo yathāsamīhitaṃ sthānam' iti pratyācacakṣe /
GK19bahcar3u:451_0: tathoktaśca bhūbhujā jigamiṣuḥ sudṛḍhaṃ samāliṅgya ṭīṭibhādīn kuvalayavanenevāśyāyaśīkarasrāviṇā sāsreṇa cakṣuṣā vokṣamāṇaḥ
GK19bahcar3u:451_1: kṣitipatiṃ punaruvāca--”tāta! bravīmi yāmīti na snehasadṛśam tvadīyāḥ prāṇā iti punaruktam /
GK19bahcar3u:470_0: triyāmāyāṃ, sākṣādāgatalakṣmīvilokanakutūhalinīṣviva samunmīlantīṣu nalinīṣu, unnidrapakṣiṇi kṣarati kusumavisaramiva tuhinakaṇanikaraṃ
GK19bahcar3u:470_1: mṛdupavanalāsitalate kānane, kamalalakṣmīprabodhamaṅgalaśaṅkheṣviva rasatsvantarbaddhadhvananmadhukareṣu makulāyamāneṣu kumudeṣu,
GK19bahcar3u:471: ujjihānaravirathavājivisṛṣṭaiḥ prothapaṭupavanaiḥ protsāyamāṇāsviva vāruṇyāṃ kakubhi puñjībhavantīṣu śyāmālatākalikāsu tārakāsu,
GK19bahcar3u:472_1: iva cyute galati tārāmaye mṛge trīnapi ṭīṭibhādīn gṛhītvā nāgayuddhavyatikaramalīmasāni śucini vanavāpīpayasi prakṣālyāṅgāni
GK19bahcar3u:474: katipayadivasāpagame ca piravrāḍ bhūbhujā vāryamāṇo 'pi vanaṃ yayau /
GK19bahcar3u:476_0: saṃpāditamanorathātiriktavibhavau ca subhaṭamaṇḍalamadhye niṣkṛṣṭamaṇḍalāgrau samaramukheṣu prathamamupayujyamānau kathāntareṣu
GK19bahcar3u:476_1: cāntarāntarā samādiṣṭo vicitrāṇi bhairavācāryacaritāni śaiśavavṛttāntāṃśca kathayantau tenaiva sārdhaṃ jarāmājagmaturiti /
GK19bahcar3u:477: iti mahākaviśrībāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣacarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dṛtīya
